amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-59 to require each federal agency to establish determinations for an officer in good standing.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require each Federal agency to establish determinations for an officer in good standing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 216 - 219 (Roll no. 218).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jacobs.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jacobs amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 216 - 219 (Roll no. 218).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
